org.jgum.category

Class Category

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgum.category.Category
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LabeledCategory

    public class Category
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A hierarchical category associated with named properties.
    Author:
    sergioc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getCategorization

        public Categorization<?> getCategorization()
        Returns:
        the categorization where this category exists.

      • getProperty

        public CategoryProperty<?> getProperty(Object property)
        Parameters:
        property - a property name.
        Returns:
        a category property.

      • containsProperty

        public boolean containsProperty(Object property)
        Parameters:
        property - a property name.
        Returns:
        true if the property is defined in the category. false otherwise. It attempts to find it in ancestor categories if the property is not locally present.

      • getLocalProperty

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<?> getLocalProperty(Object property)
        Parameters:
        property - a property name.
        Returns:
        an optional with the property value in the current category (if any). It does not query ancestor categories if the property is not locally present.

      • containsLocalProperty

        public boolean containsLocalProperty(Object property)
        Parameters:
        property - a property name.
        Returns:
        true if the property exists in the current category. false otherwise. It does not query ancestor categories if the property is not locally present.

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(Object property,
               Object value)
        Set a property to a given value.
        Parameters:
        property - the property name to set.
        value - the value of the property.

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(Object property,
               Object value,
               boolean canOverride)
        Set a property to a given value. Rises an exception if the property is already set and the canOverride parameter is false.
        Parameters:
        property - the property to set.
        value - the label of the property.
        canOverride - a boolean indicating if the property can be overridden or not.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the property exists and it cannot be overridden.

      • getStrategy

        public <T> T getStrategy(Class<T> strategyInterface)
        Parameters:
        strategyInterface - the interface implemented by the desired strategy object. It is also the property name under which strategies are associated with categories in this and upper categories.
        Returns:
        a strategy object implementing the given interface.

      • getStrategy

        public Object getStrategy(Object property,
                 Class<?>[] strategyInterfaces)
        Parameters:
        property - a property associated with a strategy in the current and upper categories.
        strategyInterfaces - the interfaces implemented by the strategy object.
        Returns:
        a strategy object implementing the given interfaces.

      • getSuper

        public <U extends Category> com.google.common.base.Optional<U> getSuper()
        Returns:
        an optional with the super category.

      • linearize

        public <U extends Category> List<U> linearize(com.google.common.base.Function<U,List<U>> linearizationFunction)
        Parameters:
        linearizationFunction - is a linearization function.
        Returns:
        a list of categories, according to the given linearization function.

      • properties

        public <U> List<U> properties(Object property,
                     com.google.common.base.Function<Category,List<Category>> linearizationFunction)
        Parameters:
        property - a property name.
        linearizationFunction - is a linearization function.
        Returns:
        a list of properties in the categories obtained with the given linearization function.

      • bottomUpProperties

        public <U> List<U> bottomUpProperties(Object property)
        Parameters:
        property - a property name.
        Returns:
        a list of properties in the bottom-up linearization.

      • topDownProperties

        public <U> List<U> topDownProperties(Object property)
        Parameters:
        property - a property name.
        Returns:
        a list of properties in the top-down linearization.

      • bottomUpCategories

        public <U extends Category> List<U> bottomUpCategories()
        Returns:
        a linearization using the default bottom-up linearization function.

      • topDownCategories

        public <U extends Category> List<U> topDownCategories()
        Returns:
        a linearization using the default top-down linearization function.

      • getParents

        public <U extends Category> List<U> getParents()
        Returns:
        the parents of this category. The ordering in which parents are returned is determined by subclasses.

      • getChildren

        public <U extends Category> List<U> getChildren()
        Returns:
        the children of this category. The ordering in which children are returned is determined by subclasses.

      • isRoot

        public boolean isRoot()
        Returns:
        true if the current category corresponds to the root category. false otherwise.

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
